name: Fighting Cock - Torpedo
additionalNotes: The Nestor Plasencia brand, recognized for its craftsmanship in Nicaragua, has launched a new, truly unique line of cigars with the Fighting Cock. Its products offer a medium body that stands out for its fillings and golden habano layer, which provide a creamy texture and complexity of flavor. With nuances of pepper, oak, cream, earth and coffee, the Fighting Cock has achieved an impressive formula. Ideal to enjoy with a whisky for a truly exceptional experience.
